snippet.title: Void and Meddler - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available for pre-order :
http://voidandmeddler.com/

Mi-Clos Studio presents
A game by no CVT and Black Muffin

Void and Meddler is a deep trip inside the mazelike mind of Fyn, wandering in an uncertain era, in an undefined city. People are used to take hormones drugs and collect false memories. This make it easier to change their life and become the person they want to be.

The idea behing Void and Meddler was to create a game that looks like its creators, two musicians nurtured by noise rock from the 80's, synthwave, road trips and cyberpunk literature.
A first demo was created for PointAndClickJam, where the game won 3rd place. The many positive reviews from both players and press encouraged us to develop a full length version respecting the original prototype.

Features:

- Non-linear point&click adventure in 6 acts (3 episodes)
- Fucked-up cyberpunk story
- Puzzles can be solved in different ways
- Surreal atmosphere inspired by Phillip K. Dick, William Gibson, David Cronenberg, Shinya Tsukamoto and Gregg Araki
- Memorable soundtrack
- Unique art style between pixel art and painting
